extendedInfo.description: ** A JELLYBEAN SPECIFIC VERSION IS NOW AVAILABLE. CHECKOUT FINANCE WIZARD BY CLICKING VIEW MORE OF MY APPS **A collection of 70+ calculators albeit mostly finance related in one easy to use app. Lite version is ad supported. Furthermore, you are able to copy, share, and export calculations. More financial calculators coming and feel free to e-mail me suggestions, problems, and the like. At Present:    Annuity - Future Value calculator    Annuity - Payment (FV) calculator    Annuity Due - Future Value calculator    Annuity Due Payment (FV) calculator    Currency Converter    Average Collection Period calculator	BMI Calculator calculator	Bond Equivalent Yield calculator	Capital Gains Yield calculator	Compound Interest calculator	Continuous Compounding calculator	Current Ratio calculator	Days in Inventory calculator	Debt Ratio calculator	Debt to Equity Ratio (D/E) calculator	Debt to Income Ratio calculator	Decibels of Change calculator	Dividend Payout Ratio calculator	Dividend Yield (Stock) calculator	Discount Calculator calculator	Dividends Per Share calculator	Doubling Time calculator	Doubling Time - Continuous Compounding calculator	Earnings Per Share calculator	Equity Multiplier calculator	Estimated Earnings calculator	Future Value calculator	Future Value Continuous Compounding calculator	Future Value Factor calculator	Growing Annuity - Future Value calculator	Growing Annuity Payment - PV calculator	Growing Annuity - Present Value calculator	Growing Perpetuity - Present Value calculator	Interest Coverage Ratio calculator	Inventory Turnover Ratio calculator	Loan - Balloon Balance calculator    Loan - Payment calculator    Loan - Remaining Balance calculator    Loan to Deposit Ratio calculator    Loan to Value Ratio calculator	Mortgage Calculator calculator	Net Asset Value calculator	Net Profit Margin calculator	Net Working Capital calculator	Ohm's Law calculator	Payback Period calculator	Perpetuity calculator	Planetary Age Calculator calculator	Planetary Weight Calculator calculator    Preferred Stock calculator    Present Value calculator    Present Value - Continuous Compounding calculator    Price to Book Value calculator    Price Earnings Ratio calculator    Price to Sales Ratio calculator    Quick Ratio calculator	Random Password Generator calculator    Rate Of Inflation calculator    Receivables Turnover Ratio calculator    Retention Ratio calculator    Return on Assets (ROA) calculator    Return on Equity (ROE) calculator    Return on Investment (ROI) calculator    Risk Premium calculator    Rule of 72 calculator	Sales Tax Calculator calculator	Simple Interest calculator	Stock - PV with Constant Growth calculator	Tax Equivalent Yield calculator	Total Stock Return calculator	Tip Calculator calculator       Zero Coupon Bond Value calculator      Zero Coupon Bond Yield calculator

reviews.title: Awesome Applaction!
reviews.comment: Sales Tax, Discount, Tip-- It\'s perfect just what I was looking for! If u breathe, then there is a calculator that fits your life style -- in the handful of 70!!!! Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works quite well.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this for a couple weeks. Really useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best application for financial calculatio, also request to add the out-put in Indian Rupees ... Please .....thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not upto the marks
reviews.comment: please arrange to add inr . and make it more user friendly
reviews.author: Supreet Singh

reviews.comment: This sucks. Other apps better for mortgage calc
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t calculate correctly
reviews.comment: I tried using the compound interest calculation with $5000 at 1% for 48 periods and it came back with $3700.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Jonathan Obest

reviews.title: So far so good...
reviews.comment: However, please could the currencies be in order of either their code or their English name...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It is so useful
reviews.comment: Its incredibly useful for my business and finance classes saved me from buying a $30 calculator
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app. Easy to user and excellent at it. It would be awesome if it allows bookmarking or pre sets so user can jump to their most use function.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Name must be Simple MultiCalc(ulator)! Pse alphabet the Currency!so annoying.Add BMR, BSA?convert flat to annual eff rate,IRR?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: never need another like kind! & for only 128kb space- congrats
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Man, you have absolutely made my day! Epic app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: GREAT APP. Can there be a setting so I can choose a default setting so it can\'t start on calc of my choice instead of anuity? Will give 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User
